mapper.select: select * from t_ship_confirmation_sheet where CONFIRMATION_SHEET_ID=#{confirmationSheetId} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_confirmation_sheet where UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
mapper.update: update t_ship_confirmation_sheet SET ALIVE_FLAG = #{aliveFlag} where UUID = #{uuid}
mapper.select: select * from t_ship_confirmation_sheet where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and SHIP_AGREEMENT_ID=#{shipAgreementId}
SELECT tscs.* FROM t_ship_confirmation_sheet tscs LEFT OUTER JOIN t_ship_agreement tsa ON tsa.AGREEMENT_ID = tscs.SHIP_AGREEMENT_ID WHERE tsa.UUID = #{agreementUuid}

SELECT tscs.* FROM t_ship_confirmation_sheet tscs LEFT OUTER JOIN t_ship_agreement tsa ON tsa.AGREEMENT_ID = tscs.SHIP_AGREEMENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN t_ship_demands tsd on tsd.DEMANDS_ID = tsa.DEMANDS_ID where tsd.UUID =#{demandsUuid}
select * from t_ship_confirmation_sheet where ALIVE_FLAG = '1' and SHIP_AGREEMENT_ID = #{id}
